name: Barroom Brawler

sections.text: Once per day as a move action, you can gain the benefit of a combat feat that you do not possess for 1 minute. You must otherwise meet all of the feat's requirements.
sections.name: Benefits

sections.text: If you have the martial flexibility class feature, this feat instead grants you one additional use per day of that ability.
sections.name: Special

description: You have learned how to mimic the combat tricks and forms of others.
